title: Could residential air-source heat pumps exacerbate outdoor summer overheating and winter overcooling in UK 2050s climate scenarios?
content:
Publication date: Available online 12 September 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society

Author(s): Xiaoxiong Xie, Zhiwen Luo, Sue Grimmond, Yiqing Liu, Carlos E. Ugalde-Loo, Matthew T. Bailey, Xinfang Wang
